title: Modern Urban Yerba Buena Lofts - Upgra’d Lights, 20ft Ceilings!!!
posting_body: ['Modern Urban Yerba Buena Lofts - Upgra’d Lights, 20ft Ceilings!!!', '   \u2028\u2028 \u2028HUGE 1000 sq/ft, 2-floor loft in the exclusive Yerba Buena Lofts YBL building on Folsom between 4th and 5th at 855 Folsom.', 'The loft is on the lucky 7th floor out of 9 floors total in the building.', '\u2028\u2028This is urban living at its best.', 'Includes all new everything with state-of-the-art amenities: \u2028* One full bath, One-half bath \u2028* Floor to ceiling 20ft glass windows for a light-filled home.', "* Includes a private outdoor terrace with outstanding DOWNTOWN views \u2028* Very large walk-in custom California Closet \u2028* Concrete construction and solid double paned glass windows \u2028* Indoor deeded secured parking available\u2028* Fiber optic wiring: capacity for multiple phone lines and fast Internet speeds \u2028* Architecturally significant building by renowned architect Stanley Saitowitz \u2028\u2028HIGH END FINISHES: \u2028* Gorgeous upgraded all hardwood Brazilian Cherry flooring downstairs with high-end wool carpet upstairs \u2028* chef's kitchen with high-end stainless steel GE appliances: including full-size refrigerator w/ ice & water dispenser, dishwasher, microwave, and oven, garbage disposal,  granite countertops \u2028* Greg Banki (Limn) lighting in living room \u2028*", 'Maytag washer and dryer\u2028*Windows are complete with Limn custom opaque retractable window coverings.', 'GREAT LOCATION: \u2028* Across from Whole Foods, Oola, Lulu’s, Sony Metreon, Yerba Buena Gardens, and SF MOMA \u2028* Blocks away from Freeways 280, 101, and the Bay Bridge \u2028* Minutes away from Union Square, South Beach, and SF Shopping Center \u2028* Walk to MUNI, Bart \u2028\u2028SERVICES: \u2028* 24 Hour manned security and cameras \u2028* Concierge Room: Security handles packages, key service, and dry cleaning \u2028* Full-time Building Manager and Engineer \u2028* Utilities Includes: Water, sewer, garbage, common areas, and building insurance', '* Deeded attached private parking space available', 'Check out pics on the website: <URL>/', 'Also here are more pictures of the loft:', '<URL>', 'ONLY TERMS:', '*No Pets', '*One-year lease with credit check', 'For more information and to view this apartment, please call: \u2028Irene at', 'show contact info', 'Four-One-Five / 5Seven7-Four-4-Five5']
